title: Account merg
body: when is riot going to allow account merging i have a account on us servers i transferd to oce but the first few weeks was horrid on the servers  so i transfers back and made another account on oce well now that the oce servers are running fine i want to merg my accounts they did account mergers for us and eu accounts when will they do us and oce

replies.body:
Woah, you can merge accounts? That's technically possible?

This brings on a new level of my understanding.
